HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases products and provides navigation to different sections of the website.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo that navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.
